review: Doctor is good, clinic needs patient friendly infrastructure, prescription or receipts to be given to patients

Dr. Radha Krishnan is an exceptionally qualified,  good-looking, brilliant, and compassionate doctor who has been instrumental in assisting my mom, sister and me with our leg-related issues. Remarkably, my sister, residing in the USA, found significant relief after consulting with him during her visit to India. His prompt responsiveness to calls and texts further underscores his dedication to patient care. I wholeheartedly recommend his services to anyone in need of ortho care .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr.Radha Krishna he is so friendly *** ************* ****** ** **** ***, and he is our family doctor.
He is treating the patient friendly in nature. Listing patient problem very peacefully, Giving good suggestion to recover the problems.. And giving best medicines.. One of the Best doctor..and when ever I called him ,he would respond immediately...!
He has never treated us like patient, he treats everyone like a family and gives best temporary and permanent solution thank you Dr R.K , India needs good doctor's like you....!

I was suffering with knee pain ,particularly ti kick start the bike i had difficulty after consulting dr.radhakrishnan,he advised some medicarion and asked me to do some small exercises.it is twenty days nearly and i am comfortable.l would suggest this dr for all the ortho problems

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited the doc for shoulder and knee pain, instantly they asked for an x-ray which was done in-house in their clinic, after seeing the x-ray he prescribed medicine and physiotherapy for 7 days. physiotherapist is also in house, for all 7 days physiotherapist came on different times not even a once physiotherapist came on appointment time.further  I asked for x-ray, they simply said we have to ask the doctor, and it's been more than a month, I have not received the report, I have asked the report  for at least 15 times over call/msg/visiting at clinic, but they are not interested after getting the money. my last bill for physiotherapy is also not given, got only unacceptable reasons.nobody should consult with them* ****** *** *** ****** ** *** ******

review: Review after a month of treatment!! I happened to visit dr radhakrishnan One month before for my mother’s severe knee pain due to osteoarthritis. He is a thorough professional who knows his craft well!! He was very kind and caring and he explained the entire scenario of osteoarthritis and how it can cripple and wat medications and exercises to be followed to my mom. He even demonstrated exercises to be followed And made my mother repeat the same and gave corrections to it .. medications and supplements , exercises  really  made a huge difference To my mothers wellbeing  .. i recommend dr radhakrishnan to others also !!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor Radakrishnan is very friendly in nature so that we are comfortable in explaining our problems to him so that he was able to diagnose and treat us well. His way of treatment was very clear to us and it should us good results and i went for ACL tear and after the surgery and complete medication for 6months now i am completly well and i am able to playfootball again like before. *** *** ********* *** **** *** **** ******** ** *** ***** ********* *** ** ** **** ********** ** *** ***** ** *****
Dr Radhakrishnan was very helpful and professional in his approach. I had a fracture in my hand, he helped with both the immediate treatment and post recovery care.

Very nice Doctor. With good diagnosing capabilities. ********* ********* ** **** *****
My overall experience at Ortho clinic was very good.

Dr Radhakrishnan is a very patient friendly doctor. He is very prompt in attending to the references and discusses the treatment outcomes from time to time. All the clients I had referred to him have given a very good opinion about Dr.
The doctor was very patient is listening to the complaints and treated me with the right set of medicines and also requested me to come for regular follow ups.

Not recommended at all. Had a very bad experience,  just had to pay the bills and collect my tablets, their work is done. even to get the bills I need to call them and ask. till now after 3 months I didn't receive my reports or no follow-up done.
Doctor was very helpful in explaining the issue and suggesting the best way forward. The staff are very helpful
Fantastic experience The best ortho dr Shows lot of concerns for patient . He handles very cooley and highly knowledgeable

I was very happy with my consultation with Dr. Radhakrishnan. He patiently explained everything to me. I felt at ease and reassured after visiting doctor. Very satisfied with the treatment given to me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: When we book through Practo , doctor unaware of the time we book. I booked for 7.00 pm slot, but doctor arrived at 7.20 only. *** ********* ** **** * He explained the reason behind the pain. I was given medication for a week, also vitamin tablets for a month. Physio therapy given for both heel. Other medical staff also friendly. Practo needs to update doctor regarding the bookings online well before, so that we dont have to wait.
reply_text: Thank you  for visiting us .. we will initiate Practo to improve the service better ., especially internal communications.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

reply_text: Thank u for visiting us .. hope your feeling better now .. we will take forward your feed back to the management regarding pharmacy billing  and rectify it . Tc
